author: Bob Waterfield
comment: Tried several different time settings.  Never went off or gave any indication of an alarm.   Since update works great now.
title: Did not work on LG watch R

comment: Would have been 5 stars if the alarms could be edited from the phone app and if it had setting to repeat the alarm...
title: Phone app

author: Jan Harley
comment: Needs an update to include a repeat function.  Pretty useless otherwise.

author: Chantell Johnson
comment: Why is this just vibrating without sound?
title: Sound missing

author: Raliek Allah
comment: Just needs daily repeat alarm ability.
title: Well done

reply.author: Nicolas C Perez
reply.content:
Hi Gary
Thank for download, test and review the app.
I will appreciate if you please send me some info about the problem you found, to solve it for you and the others who download the app.
Thanks in advance.
Best regards
Nicolas.

author: Johannes Seitz
comment: But can't give a better review because there isn't any kind of alarm shown

reply.author: Nicolas C Perez
reply.content:
Hi Johannes
There is a new version of the Alarm app, that play alarm on watch and phone and solve the problem in the previous one.
I will appreciate if you please could update it, test it, and let me now
Know your comments  about it.
Thanks in advance and have a nice weekend.
Best regards 
Nicolas

title: Good idea
